page.title: 13Under-Fives in Ash.
page.content: Ash has four well-established Play Groups for children in the 3-5 year age range. They provide young children with opportunities to meet other boys and girls and to develop their manipulative skills by using building bricks, Lego, jig-saw puzzles, paint and plasticine. Wendy houses, dressing-up clothes, sand, water and dolls give material to develop through imaginative play. In addition to the play groups there are approximately 20 registered Child Minders who care for children under school age and also older children during the school holidays.
